Class SignUpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.MainScreenController
      • sample.SignUpController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SignUpController
extends MainScreenController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Signup controller reads all the user input and validate it for new users and send the information back to the database and create a new user profile and a table under their name
    Since:
    2019-09-21
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Romanov Andre, Shafi Mushfique, Stephen Aranda
